mapper.insert: insert into inquirys values ((select NVL(MAX(iqNo) + 1, 1) from inquirys),#{iqmemId},#{iqpdId},#{iqTitle},#{iqContent},#{iqPrivate},#{iqState},sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.update: update inquirys set iqTitle = #{iqTitle}, iqContent = #{iqContent}, iqPrivate=#{iqPrivate}, iqUpdDate=sysdate where iqNo = #{iqNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from inquirys where iqpdId = #{getPdId}
select * from (select rownum rnum, temp.* from (select * from inquirys where iqpdId = #{pdId} order by iqRegiDate) temp) where rnum >= #{contStart} and rnum <= #{contEnd}

select * from (select iqNo, iqmemId, iqpdId, iqTitle, iqContent, iqPrivate, iqState, iqRegiDate, iqUpdDate, row_number() OVER(order by iqNo desc) as Rnum from inquirys where
iqState = 0
iqState = 1
) mp where Rnum >= #{contStart} and Rnum <= #{contEnd} order by iqNo desc
mapper.update: update inquirys set iqState = #{iqState} where iqNo = #{iqNo}
